did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Witchcraft and possession-related movie posters, lobby cards, and other cinema memorabilia, 1916-2015.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Movie posters and other advertisements for films involving witches, witchcraft, possession, devil worship and similar subjects.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Movie posters and other advertisements for films involving witches, witchcraft, possession, devil worship and similar subjects. The films are often of a "cult movie" nature from the United States and Europe with a few from Asia and Africa. Also includes other advertisements and mass market materials involving witches including two political T-shirts from 2010, one concerning the Delaware Tea Party (showing a witch stirring a cauldron-sized cup of tea) and one depicting Senate candidate Christine O'Donnell as a witch.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Witchcraft and Possession-Related Movie Posters, Lobby Cards, and Other Cinema Memorabilia, #4781. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p: Posters arranged chronologically then alphabetically by the original title of the film (according to IMDb) so that all the posters for the same film are kept together. Original title as well as other release titles also given.
